mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RECRUITMENT(RECRUITMENT_NO, RECRUITMENT_TITLE, RECRUITMENT_CONTENT, RECRUITMENT_WRITER, RECRUITMENT_START, RECRUITMENT_END, RECRUITMENT_LOCATION ) VALUES(SEQ_RECRUITMENT.NEXTVAL, #{recruitmentTitle}, #{recruitmentContent}, #{recruitmentWriter}, #{recruitmentStart}, #{recruitmentEnd}, #{recruitmentLocation} )

INSERT INTO RECRUITMENT_ATTACHMENT(RECRUITMENT_ATTACHMENT_NO, RECRUITMENT_NO, RECRUITMENT_ATTACHMENT_ORIGIN, RECRUITMENT_ATTACHMENT_CHANGE, RECRUITMENT_ATTACHMENT_PATH, RECRUITMENT_ATTACHMENT_LEVEL) VALUES(SEQ_RECRUITMENT_ATTACHMENT.NEXTVAL, SEQ_RECRUITMENT.CURRVAL, #{rAttachmentOrigin}, #{rAttachmentChange}, #{rAttachmentPath}, #{rAttachmentLevel})
INSERT INTO PRELATION(RECRUITMENT_NO, TAGS_NO) VALUES(SEQ_RECRUITMENT.CURRVAL, (SELECT TAGS_NO FROM TAGS T WHERE T.TAGS_NAME=#{tagNo}))
INSERT INTO RECRUITMENT_STATE(RECRUITMENT_NO, ROLE, MAX_PERSONNEL) VALUES(SEQ_RECRUITMENT.CURRVAL, #{position}, #{maxPersonnel})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RECRUITMENT WHERE RECRUITMENT_DELETE IS NULL

SELECT RECRUITMENT_NO, RECRUITMENT_TITLE, RECRUITMENT_CONTENT, MEMBER_NAME AS "RECRUITMENT_WRITER", TO_CHAR(RECRUITMENT_INSERT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "RECRUITMENT_INSERT", TO_CHAR(RECRUITMENT_START, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "RECRUITMENT_START", TO_CHAR(RECRUITMENT_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "RECRUITMENT_END", RECRUITMENT_VIEWS, RECRUITMENT_LOCATION FROM RECRUITMENT, MEMBER WHERE RECRUITMENT_DELETE IS NULL AND MEMBER_NO = RECRUITMENT_WRITER ORDER BY RECRUITMENT_NO DESC

SELECT RECRUITMENT_ATTACHMENT_NO, RECRUITMENT_NO, RECRUITMENT_ATTACHMENT_ORIGIN, RECRUITMENT_ATTACHMENT_CHANGE, RECRUITMENT_ATTACHMENT_PATH, RECRUITMENT_ATTACHMENT_INSERT, RECRUITMENT_ATTACHMENT_LEVEL FROM RECRUITMENT_ATTACHMENT WHERE RECRUITMENT_NO=#{recruitmentNo} AND RECRUITMENT_ATTACHMENT_LEVEL = 0
SELECT PR.RECRUITMENT_NO, T.TAGS_NAME AS "TAGS_NO" FROM PRELATION PR, TAGS T WHERE PR.TAGS_NO = T.TAGS_NO AND PR.RECRUITMENT_NO=#{recruitmentNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PROJECT(PROJECT_NO, PROJECT_OWNER, RECRUITMENT_NO, PROJECT_NAME, PROJECT_INFO, PROJECT_START, PROJECT_END) VALUES(SEQ_PROJECT.NEXTVAL, #{projectOwner}, SEQ_RECRUITMENT.CURRVAL, #{projectName}, #{projectInfo}, #{projectStart}, #{projectEnd})
